meta.title: Golden Retriever Aggression: Signs & Training Tips
meta.description: Golden Retrievers are usually friendly, but aggression can occur. Learn about resource guarding, fear aggression, and how to manage it.

h1: Dealing with Aggression in Golden Retrievers

intro.short_hook: Golden Retrievers are usually friendly, but aggression can occur. Learn about resource guarding, fear aggression, and how to manage it.
intro.who_struggles_with_this: Owners of this breed often face this issue due to natural instincts.

quick_answers.answer: This is a sample quick answer for validation purposes.

what_you_can_try.when_to_talk_to_vet: If behavior changes suddenly or is severe.
